output:
• Every year, we recruit between 2,000 and 3,000 new employees in France, of whom around a half are experienced. Our international operations also hire people in equivalent proportions. Our recruitment needs cover the whole Bouygues Construction value chain, and they are particularly strong in site work, sales and the design office.
• Even though the economic context has grown more uncertain, we are still recruiting so that we can continue to strengthen our expertise and prepare for the future.
